room_title: Escape room "The Dwelling" by Michigan Escape Games in Davison
review: Having done more than 10 rooms at numerous locations, this one ranks up there with the best. We've done three (CDC, Dwelling, Heist), all have not disappointed. Well built rooms with plenty of unexpected twists. A great time for beginners and experienced minds alike. Personally, I would recommend trying to get enough people to fill a room, just for the best experience and comfort level for all.

room_title: Escape room "The Dwelling" by Michigan Escape Games in Davison
review: We had such a fun time escaping The Dwelling room! What a great mix of puzzles and just the right amount of creepiness. We definitely want to come back and escape another room.

room_title: Escape room "The Dwelling" by Michigan Escape Games in Davison
review: I've been to Novi and Frankenmuth and, hands down, Michigan Escape Games in Davison has the best games with the most challenging puzzles. I can't wait to come back and try to escape. I've tried The Abduction, CDC, and The Dwelling. I would recommend all three games!

room_title: Escape room "The Dwelling" by Michigan Escape Games in Davison
review: Was there last night with a group of friends. We did the Dwelling. Unfortunately, we didn't get out in time, but we will go back again!

room_title: Escape room "The Dwelling" by Michigan Escape Games in Davison
review: Our game, The Dwelling, was really hard. We didn't escape but we were close! It was excellently designed, challenging, scary and fun. This was our first time. We look forward to trying another one of their games!
